data.title: Mrs. Pooja Sharma – St. Aloysius Institute of Technology
data.text:
Name: Mrs. Pooja Sharma

Designation: Assistant Professor

Subject/Area: Education and Zoology

Qualification: M.Sc. (Zoology) M.Ed. (Ele. Edu.), PGDCA., M.A. (Hindi), Ph.D.(Pursuing)

Contact: +919981556411

Email: : ps752583@gmail.com

16 Years

Books Published:

Vidyalaya Sanskriti Parivartan Aur Shikshk Vikas (ISBN- 978-93-83584-34-5)

Pedagogy of Environment Education (ISBN No-978-817457-230

Research Paper:

Nari shiksha aur Gandhiji, International conference Navyug college Jabalpur

Vartman shiksha pranali me hindi ki upeksha ke karan, Saint Aloysius College sadar ISBN NO-978-93-84899-79-0

Study of criteria iiird research consultancy and extension

9th NCERT HINDI BOOK- edited 3 chapters

Convener of national webinar on” Indian Herbs’ Immunity Booster during and post covid –

19 in Indian perspective”

CO-ORDINATOR OF “Internationational webinar on Discipline is Key to Successful Career

and Know Yourself and your significance”

Co- ordinates Three days conference on “-… त्रि-त्रिवसीय अंतर्राष्ट्रीय वेब सम्मेलन

“आत्मत्रनर्ार् र्रर्त हेतुसरमरत्रिक पुनर्ा चनर मेंसरत्रहत्य की र्ूत्रमकर”
